verses.verse: Then they set <S%H5265><s%> out from Elim, <S%H362><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sin, <S%H9358><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is between <S%H996><s%> Elim <S%H362><s%> and Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> on the fifteenth <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the second <S%H8145><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> after their departure <S%H3318><s%> from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And the whole <S%H3605><s%> congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> grumbled <S%H9235><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, "Would <S%H4310><s%> <S%H5414><s%> that we had died <S%H4191><s%> by the Lord's hand <S%H3027><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> when we sat <S%H3427><s%> by the pots <S%H5518><s%> of meat, <S%H1320><s%> when we ate <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> to the full; <S%H7648><s%> for you have brought <S%H3318><s%> us out into this <S%H2088><s%> wilderness <S%H4057><s%> to kill <S%H4191><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> whole <S%H3605><s%> assembly <S%H6951><s%> with hunger. <S%H7458><s%>"

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will rain <S%H4305><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%> for you; and the people <S%H5971><s%> shall go <S%H3318><s%> out and gather <S%H3950><s%> a day <S%H3117><s%>'s portion <S%H1697><s%> every day, that I may test <S%H5254><s%> them, whether or <S%H518><s%> not they will walk <S%H1980><s%> in My instruction. <S%H8451><s%>

"And it will come <S%H1961><s%> about on the sixth <S%H8345><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> when they prepare <S%H3559><s%> what <S%H834><s%> they bring <S%H935><s%> in, it will be twice <S%H4932><s%> as much <S%H834><s%> as they gather <S%H3950><s%> daily. <S%H3117><s%>"

So Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> "At evening <S%H6153><s%> you will know <S%H3045><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has brought <S%H3318><s%> you out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%>

and in the morning <S%H1242><s%> you will see <S%H7200><s%> the glory <S%H9202><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> for He hears <S%H8085><s%> your grumblings <S%H8519><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> and what <S%H4100><s%> are we, that you grumble <S%H9235><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> us? "

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "[This will happen] when the Lord <S%H3068><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you meat <S%H1320><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%> in the evening, <S%H6153><s%> and bread <S%H3899><s%> to the full <S%H7646><s%> in the morning; <S%H1242><s%> for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> hears <S%H8085><s%> your grumblings <S%H8519><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you grumble <S%H9235><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Him. And what <S%H4100><s%> are we? Your grumblings <S%H8519><s%> are not against <S%H5921><s%> us but against <S%H5921><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>"

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> "Say <S%H559><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> 'Come <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> for He has heard <S%H8085><s%> your grumblings. <S%H8519><s%>'"

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about as Aaron <S%H175><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to the whole <S%H3605><s%> congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that they looked <S%H6437><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> the glory <S%H9202><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> in the cloud. <S%H6051><s%>
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"I have heard <S%H8085><s%> the grumblings <S%H8519><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> to them, saying, <S%H559><s%> 'At twilight <S%H6153><s%> you shall eat <S%H398><s%> meat, <S%H1320><s%> and in the morning <S%H1242><s%> you shall be filled <S%H7646><s%> with bread; <S%H3899><s%> and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>'"

So it came <S%H1961><s%> about at evening <S%H6153><s%> that the quails <S%H7958><s%> came <S%H5927><s%> up and covered <S%H3680><s%> the camp, <S%H4264><s%> and in the morning <S%H1242><s%> there was a layer <S%H7902><s%> of dew <S%H2919><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> the camp. <S%H4264><s%>

When the layer <S%H7902><s%> of dew <S%H2919><s%> evaporated, <S%H5927><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> on the surface <S%H6440><s%> of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> there was a fine <S%H1851><s%> flake-like thing, <S%H2636><s%> fine <S%H1851><s%> as the frost <S%H9214><s%> on the ground. <S%H776><s%>

When the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> [it,] they said <S%H559><s%> to one <S%H376><s%> another, <S%H251><s%> "What <S%H9271><s%> is it?" For they did not know <S%H3045><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> it was. And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, "It is the bread <S%H3899><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> you to eat. <S%H402><s%>

"This <S%H2088><s%> is what <S%H1697><s%> <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has commanded, <S%H6680><s%> 'Gather <S%H3950><s%> of it every <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> as much <S%H6310><s%> as he should eat; <S%H398><s%> you shall take <S%H3947><s%> an omer <S%H9418><s%> apiece <S%H1538><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of persons <S%H5315><s%> each <S%H376><s%> of you has <S%H3947><s%> in his tent. <S%H168><s%>'"
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so, <S%H3651><s%> and [some] gathered <S%H3950><s%> much <S%H7235><s%> and [some] little. <S%H4591><s%>

When they measured <S%H4058><s%> it with an omer, <S%H9418><s%> he who had <S%H7235><s%> gathered much <S%H7235><s%> had no <S%H3808><s%> excess, <S%H5736><s%> and he who had <S%H4591><s%> gathered little <S%H4591><s%> had no <S%H3808><s%> lack; <S%H2637><s%> every <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> gathered <S%H3950><s%> as much <S%H6310><s%> as he should eat. <S%H398><s%>
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, "Let no <S%H408><s%> man <S%H376><s%> leave <S%H3498><s%> any <S%H4480><s%> of it until <S%H5704><s%> morning. <S%H1242><s%>"

But they did not listen <S%H8085><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and some <S%H376><s%> left <S%H3498><s%> part of it until <S%H5704><s%> morning, <S%H1242><s%> and it bred <S%H9560><s%> worms <S%H8438><s%> and became <S%H887><s%> foul; <S%H887><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> was angry <S%H7107><s%> with them.

And they gathered <S%H3950><s%> it morning <S%H1242><s%> by morning, <S%H1242><s%> every <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> as much <S%H6310><s%> as he should eat; <S%H398><s%> but when the sun <S%H8121><s%> grew <S%H2552><s%> hot, <S%H2552><s%> it would melt. <S%H4549><s%>

Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about on the sixth <S%H8345><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> they gathered <S%H3950><s%> twice <S%H4932><s%> as much <S%H4932><s%> bread, <S%H3899><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> omers <S%H9418><s%> for each <S%H259><s%> one. <S%H259><s%> When all <S%H3605><s%> the leaders <S%H5387><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and told <S%H5046><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%>

then he said <S%H559><s%> to them, "This <S%H1931><s%> is what <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> meant: <S%H1696><s%> Tomorrow <S%H4279><s%> is a sabbath <S%H7677><s%> observance, <S%H7677><s%> a holy <S%H6944><s%> sabbath <S%H7676><s%> to the Lord. <S%H3068><s%> Bake <S%H644><s%> what <S%H834><s%> you will bake <S%H644><s%> and boil <S%H1310><s%> what <S%H834><s%> you will boil, <S%H1310><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that is left <S%H5736><s%> over <S%H5736><s%> put <S%H5117><s%> aside <S%H5117><s%> to be kept <S%H4931><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> morning. <S%H1242><s%>"

So they put <S%H5117><s%> it aside <S%H5117><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> morning, <S%H1242><s%> as Moses <S%H4872><s%> had ordered, <S%H6680><s%> and it did not become <S%H887><s%> foul, <S%H887><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> was there any worm <S%H7415><s%> in it.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Eat <S%H398><s%> it today, <S%H3117><s%> for today <S%H3117><s%> is a sabbath <S%H7676><s%> to the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> today <S%H3117><s%> you will not find <S%H4672><s%> it in the field. <S%H7704><s%>
"Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall gather <S%H3950><s%> it, but on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> [the] sabbath, <S%H7676><s%> there will be none. <S%H3808><s%>"

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> that some <S%H4480><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out to gather, <S%H3950><s%> but they found <S%H4672><s%> none. <S%H3808><s%>

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "How <S%H575><s%> long <S%H5704><s%> do you refuse <S%H3985><s%> to keep <S%H8104><s%> My commandments <S%H4687><s%> and My instructions <S%H8451><s%>?

"See, <S%H7200><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> you the sabbath; <S%H7676><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> He gives <S%H5414><s%> you bread <S%H3899><s%> for two days <S%H3117><s%> on the sixth <S%H8345><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%> Remain <S%H3427><s%> every <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> in his place; <S%H8478><s%> let no <S%H408><s%> man <S%H376><s%> go <S%H3318><s%> out of his place <S%H4725><s%> on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>"
So the people <S%H5971><s%> rested <S%H7673><s%> on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> it manna, <S%H4478><s%> and it was like coriander <S%H1407><s%> seed, <S%H2233><s%> white; <S%H3836><s%> and its taste <S%H2940><s%> was like wafers <S%H6838><s%> with honey. <S%H1706><s%>

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "This <S%H2088><s%> is what <S%H1697><s%> <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has commanded, <S%H6680><s%> 'Let an omerful <S%H4393><s%> <S%H9418><s%> of it be kept <S%H4931><s%> throughout your generations, <S%H1755><s%> that they may see <S%H7200><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> that I fed <S%H398><s%> you in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> when I brought <S%H3318><s%> you out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>'"

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> "Take <S%H3947><s%> a jar <S%H6803><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> an omerful <S%H4393><s%> <S%H9418><s%> of manna <S%H4478><s%> in it, and place <S%H5117><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> to be kept <S%H4931><s%> throughout your generations. <S%H1755><s%>"
As the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> so Aaron <S%H175><s%> placed <S%H5117><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> the Testimony, <S%H5715><s%> to be kept. <S%H4931><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> ate <S%H398><s%> the manna <S%H4478><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> they came <S%H935><s%> to an inhabited <S%H3427><s%> land; <S%H776><s%> they ate <S%H398><s%> the manna <S%H4478><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> they came <S%H935><s%> to the border <S%H7097><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan. <S%H3667><s%>
(Now an omer <S%H9418><s%> is a tenth <S%H6224><s%> of an ephah. <S%H374><s%>)
